end-to-end.translation[0].definitions[0]: involving products that cover all the stages of a particular process, service etc
The demand for end-to-end product development and manufacturing solutions is turning suppliers into one-stop shops  (=companies which supply everything related to a particular activity).
end-to-end.translation[0].definitions[1]: end-to-end services provide everything that is needed to connect someone to a COMPUTER NETWORK and let them send and receive information using it
The company will offer end-to-end videoconferencing products  (=camera and screen at both ends, network connections etc).
